com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp

Class MleDppReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp.MleDppReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MleDppInput

    public class MleDppReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a Magic Lantern Digital Playprint reader.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  MleDppReader.MleDppTOC
      This class is a Magic Lantern Digital Playprint Table-of-Contents.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MleDppReader

        public MleDppReader(java.lang.String filename)
             throws MleDppException
        Construct a Magic Lantern Digital Playprint for the specified file. The file will be opened in the specified mode.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the Digital Playprint.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the Digital Playprint can not be opened.

    • Method Detail

      • setSwap

        public void setSwap(boolean swap)
        Set swap mode.
        Parameters:
        swap - If true then byte ordering will be swapped on read.

      • getSwapRead

        public boolean getSwapRead()
        Get the swap mode.
        Returns:
        true will be returned if byte ordering is swapped on read.

      • setSwapRead

        public void setSwapRead(boolean swap)
        Set swap mode.
        Parameters:
        swap - If true then byte ordering will be swapped on read.

      • begin

        protected boolean begin(int type)
                 throws MleDppException
        Begin reading the Digital Playprint.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of Digital Playprint to read. Valid types include:
        • MleDppUtil.MLE_PPBE_TAG
        • MleDppUtil.MLE_PPLE_TAG
        Returns:
        true is returned if the Digital Playprint is valid and ready to be read. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the DPP can not be read.

      • end

        protected boolean end()
               throws MleDppException
        Wrap-up reading the Digital Playprint.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the Digital Playprint is valid and no longer to be read. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the DPP can not be read.

      • readHeader

        protected MleDppUtil.MleDppHeader readHeader()
                                      throws MleDppException
        Read the header from the Digital Playprint.
        Returns:
        A reference to the MleDppUtil.MleDppHeader is returned.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the header can not be read.

      • beginTOC

        protected boolean beginTOC(int reserved)
                    throws MleDppException
        Begin processing the Table-of-Contents.
        Parameters:
        reserved - The number of reserved entries in the TOC.
        Returns:
        true is returned the the TOC can be processed. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the specified number of reserved entries is less than 0.

      • addTOCEntry

        protected boolean addTOCEntry(long label,
                              long offset)
                       throws MleDppException
        Add an entry to the Table-of-Contents.
        Parameters:
        label - The label for the TOC entry.
        offset - An offset into the Digital Playprint indicating the labeled cunk.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the entry is successfully added to the TOC. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the TOC is unavailable, or if the TOC is full.

      • endTOC

        protected boolean endTOC()
        Wrap-up processing the Table-of-Contents.
        Returns:
        true is always returned.

      • getFile

        public java.io.RandomAccessFile getFile()
        Get the Digital Playprint file.
        Returns:
        A reference to the RandomAccessFile is returned.
